title: Cats vs Zombies Is the Best Zombie Film in All of Forever - Give it all the Oscars.
content:
Cats fight zombies to save the survivor kitten!  Michael Tivikoff,  or  Mr.TVCow  on Youtube, created the video. For more cute action movies, check out his other work, like  Assassin’s Kittens Unity  or  Epic Bunny’s Adventure . 
 
(via  Laughing Squid ) 
 
—Please make note of The Mary Sue’s general comment policy .—
